name: Lidia Bastianich's Fennel, Olive and Lemon Salad
keywords: black olives, fennel, lemon, raw, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 cups Gaeta or other good oil-cured black olives, pitted
1 lemon, washed, dried and cut in 1/8-inch cubes, including rind
2 cups fennel, washed, dried and cut into 1/8-inch pieces, including fronds

recipeInstructions.text: Toss all ingredients together, and mix.
Let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes before serving.
